/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees and buildings on both sides. The sky above is a hazy blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the harmonious blend of nature and architecture in the city.
